casename: Public Prosecutor v Tay Chin Wah
counsel: Raymond Fong and Chew Siong Tai (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the public prosecutor; Chua Eng Hui (Infinitus Law Corporation) and Ong Cheong Wei (Rayney Wong & Eric Ng) for the accused
